website_summaries.verdict: The Moto G Stylus is a very good midrange phone with a big, bright screen, long battery life, and a built-in stylus for taking notes.

customer_reviews.title: A let down
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Netflix wouldn't stream - no video. Bit of lagging I wasn't satisfied with. Couldn't set up a work profile like on the Moto G 7. It was such a fuss trying to get it set up. I was so looking forward to this as I need a phone with a stylus but a lot of hassle unfortunately. Amazon said they would contact Motorola and call me back. They didn't call back and a week later I tried again - they said they would do the same but it was closed. They offered me the same call back service but I never trusted it so I sent the phone back. Poor customer experience sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Graeme Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great device I really like it
customer_reviews.text: This my 3rd Moto G ,I feel they offer great value ,G Pro is great I like the stylus it doesn't make quite as many mistakes as my sausages.connectivity, sounds ,screen etc all good, can't offer a comparison to other brands never had use of one Great device really like it
customer_reviews.author: martin smith

customer_reviews.text: Waiting on a delivery mix up but it seems to be being sorted. Will ammend to five stars when the problem is sorted, seller has responded promptly and tomorrow will show if they're any good
customer_reviews.author: piers roddy

customer_reviews.title: Great phone and seller
customer_reviews.text: Seller very fast at answering questions and sorting any problems would definitely buy from them again 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Complete mid range phone. I've have other things I can spend a thousand pounds on!😎
customer_reviews.text: What you get for your money is very good. It has most things I could every need for under £300.00 .
customer_reviews.author: Keith Ross Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Android One on a Moto G
customer_reviews.text: A very decent moto G phone running android one. It is also tough, has an aluminium frame. The stylus is a bonus, but not very useful on a phone, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Dwaipayan Adhya

customer_reviews.title: Slick phone.
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for my G7,which was great, this is even better. Camera , storage and a stylus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made and so easy to use. It has a good quality feel to it. I would recommend this mobile without any hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E. J. Purvis

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful well built phone great colour.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the phone, it's just the right size and very good quality buildwise strong and durable, great colour also everything works perfectly and it arrived on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not have bought it had I known it was this thick and heavy
customer_reviews.text: First impressions are it's very thick and very heavy, but it works well straight out the box, fast and good screen , low light camera is not as good as my old Huawei p smart
customer_reviews.author: Craig Hoskins-Davies

Up to two days battery life**. Go longer on a single charge with a 4000 mAh battery.
Max Vision display and Dolby audio. Bring games and movies to life on a vivid 6.4" Full HD+ display with dual stereo speakers tuned by Dolby.
Ultra-responsive performance + 128 GB storage. Feel the blazing speed of an octa-core processor—and never worry about storage space.
16 MP low-light selfie cam. Always look your best and brightest thanks to Quad Pixel technology and 4x low light sensitivity.
